software.description: 3dsvm is a command-line program and plugin for AFNI (http://www.nitrc.org/projects/afni/), built around SVM-Light (http://svmlight.joachims.org/). It performs support vector machine (SVM) analysis on fMRI data and runs on Unix+X11+Motif systems, including SGI, Solaris, Linux, and Mac OS X.
